column4: Having problems understanding subdomain setup on my karmik laptop
I want do local web devel on my laptop. How to I setup subdomains? I don't understand stuff I find on the web and need to ask specific questions at certain points.
you dont need to set up subdomains to do web dev

thanks. I am developing on drupal and using aegir which creates subdomains on the fly, so it has to be setup for that. I setup my VPS ok, but it had a control panel for wildcard dns setup. I am a linux noob so I don't understand domain stuff much.
